python:
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from rover import *
from robocon import *
from mqtt import *
import time

# Mô tả hàm này...
def GoBack():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  display.show(Image("00100:00100:10101:01110:00100"))
  rover.turn_left(25, 1)
  turn_until_condition(0, 20, lambda: ((rover.read_line_sensors() == (0, 1, 1, 0))), 5000)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Main():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  if Counter == NumOfLine:
    AIModels()
  else:
    Move()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Move():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  GoForward()
  Counter = (Counter if isinstance(Counter, (int, float)) else 0) + 1
  rover.forward(20, 0.3)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def GoForward():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  display.show(Image("00100:01110:10101:00100:00100"))
  follow_line_until(20, lambda: ((rover.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 1, 1))), 5000)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def GoLeft():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  display.show(Image("00100:00010:11111:10010:10100"))
  rover.turn_left(25, 0.3)
  turn_until_condition(0, 20, lambda: (((rover.read_line_sensors() == (0, 1, 1, 0)) or (rover.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 0, 0)))), 2000)
  follow_line_until(20, lambda: (False), 500)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AssignValue():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  Counter = 0
  ConfirmModel = 0
  RandomValue = 1
  NumOfLine = 2
  AIModel = ''

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AIModels():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  if AIModel == 'Nothing':
    rover.stop()
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
  else:
    Counter = 0
    if AIModel == 'BinhThuong':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#800080'))
      GoForward()
    elif AIModel == 'LuaNho':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffff00'))
      GoBack()
    elif AIModel == 'LuaVua':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffa500'))
      GoBack()
    elif AIModel == 'LuaLon':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
      GoBack()
    elif AIModel == 'QuatGio':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#00ff00'))
      GoLeft()
    elif AIModel == 'Rule':
      rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
      GoRight()
    else:
      display.show(Image("00100:00100:00100:00000:00100"))
      rover.stop()
      time.sleep_ms(1000000)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V1_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global Counter, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  AIModel = th_C3_B4ng_tin.strip()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def RegServer():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  mqtt.on_receive_message('V1', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V1_)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def GoRight():
  global Counter, th_C3_B4ng_tin, ConfirmModel, AIModel, NumOfLine, RandomValue
  display.show(Image("00100:01000:11111:01001:00101"))
  rover.turn_right(25, 0.3)
  turn_until_condition(20, 0, lambda: (((rover.read_line_sensors() == (0, 1, 1, 0)) or (rover.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 0, 0)))), 2000)
  follow_line_until(20, lambda: (False), 500)

if True:
  mqtt.connect_wifi('AITT_3', '66668888')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='mqtt.ohstem.vn', port=1883, username='internK', password='')
  rover.show_rgb_led(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  display.set_all('#000000')
  rover.servo_write(1, 0)
  rover.servo_write(2, 0)
  rover.stop()
  pin0.write_digital((1))
  pin1.write_digital((1))
  AssignValue()
  wait_for(lambda: (button_a.is_pressed()))
  RegServer()

while True:
  mqtt.check_message()
  say(AIModel)
  Main()
name: DemoFinal2
